raw_body: PERERA – Mr. RANOJ – (Douglas & Sons). Beloved husband of Nalini Perera,​ much loved father of Kushil & Nadeesha,​ father-in-law of Udeshika & Raveen,​ precious grandfather of Jayendri,​ Aashi,​ Yathish & Rayanya,​ brother of Dakshini,​ Doctor Dulip & Saroj,​ brother-in-Law of late Rohana,​ Enaksha,​ Kanchana,​ Wimal,​ Mangalika,​ late Gamini,​ late Ranjith,​ late Lakshman,​ Deepika & Athula,​ uncle of Ganishka,​ Nilusha,​ Dhanushki,​ Gayara and Jayan,​ passed away on 21st April 2024. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” (Jayaratne) Funeral Parlour on 24th April 2024. Cortege leaves parlour at 4.00 p.m. for cremation at General Cemetery (New Crematorium),​ Borella at 4.30 p.m. on 24th April 2024.026616
